channel.title: DeathScape [317]
channel.description:
[center][b]Hey Everyone, This Is My First Server![/b][/center]
[center][b]Features:
•Working Assault 100% •Working God Wars 100% •Working Slayer 100% •Working Veng 100% •Prayer Works 100%(It includes Chivalry and Piety) •Real dragon plate body (like the one in RuneScape, Not glitched) •Working Summoing Cape(Not Glitched) •Working Emotes 99% •Fully working Assualt+new Assault reward interface •Fully working pest control+new Pc reward interface •Fight Pits Working 100%+new ground! •Dragon claws 100% animated (4 hits on players and 2 hits on npcs) •All 4 god wars bosses working and 100% animated! •New 562 hit marks •New RuneScape Hp Bar •New Whip+Dharok axe model •New 474 Log out tab •New teleport interfaces!(Look down at the pictures) •New teleport other! •New Pk System •New Gs Stance (Thanks to Slient Cj) •New Gs Spec! (Thanks to deathchoas) •PK Points System •Shops •NPC Dialogue •Log in interface •NPC VS. PLAYER Combat •Fletching •All ancient magic works (no farcast) •All ancient magic works (with farcast) •Some normal magic •Veng •Veng other •Stat view •Jad Minigame (63 Waves) •Bounty Hunter •Edge 1v1 •Mage Bank •Varrock Team PK •Dragon Claws 4 hit spec •Normal emotes •Special attack sounds (some wepons) •Clan chat (Only 5%) •Administrator + Moderator crowns •Dharok effect •Verac effect •God wars dungeon (get godswords from here) •KBD with magic + melee •Starter package •Fletching •Guthan Effect •Almost 100% all magics •Correct 562 hits. •Dragon claw special •Dragon claw attack styles •Almost 100% magics on players. On all three spell books. •Loads More !![/b][/center]
[center][b]The Most Coolest Thing In The Game That I Have Been Working On, Are The Events! I Have Xmas Event and An Easter Event! (and you will recieve a prize once finished) [/b] [/center]
[center][b]P I C T U R E T I M E[/b][/center]
Home [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/Home.png[/img] Teleports = Green Dragons [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/GreenDragons.png[/img] Teleports = Caos Element [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/CaosElement.png[/img] Teleports = King Black Dragon [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/KingBlackDragons.png[/img] Mage Bank [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/MageBank.png[/img] God Wars [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/GodWars.png[/img] Boring Catherby [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/BoringCatherby.png[/img] Working Armadyl God Sword [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/ArmadylGodSword.png[/img] Working Bandos God Sword [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/BandosGodSword.png[/img] Working Zamorak God Sword [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/ZamorakGodSword.png[/img] Working Saradomin God Sword [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/SaradominGodSword.png[/img] MINI GAMES 1 [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/Minigames1.png[/img] MINI GAMES 2 [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/Minigames2.png[/img] Some Shops [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/SomeShops.png[/img] ALL THE SHOPS!!! [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/Shops.png[/img] ::WAR!!!! [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/warzone.png[/img] Working Farming Tele, But I Dont Think Farming Works LOL!! [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/WorkingFarmingtele.png[/img] Donator Zone [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/DonatorZone.png[/img] Donator Shops [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/DonatorItems.png[/img] Staff Zone [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/StaffZone.png[/img] Working D Claws [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/workingdclaws.png[/img] Working Wildy [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/WorkingWildy.png[/img] Xmas Event [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/XmasEvent.png[/img] Easter Event [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/EasterEvent.png[/img] Free Stuff [img]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad154/pzezima2/10Days.png[/img]
Havent Released Yet, Not Sure If I Should. Dont Want To Get Sued.....

@Pzezima2 wrote:

[center]Hey Everyone, This Is My First Server![/center]

[center][b]Features:

•Working Assault 100%
•Working God Wars 100%
•Working Slayer 100%
•Working Veng 100%
•Prayer Works 100%(It includes Chivalry and Piety)
•Real dragon plate body (like the one in RuneScape, Not glitched)
•Working Summoing Cape(Not Glitched)
•Working Emotes 99%
•Fully working Assualt+new Assault reward interface
•Fully working pest control+new Pc reward interface
•Fight Pits Working 100%+new ground!
•Dragon claws 100% animated (4 hits on players and 2 hits on npcs)
•All 4 god wars bosses working and 100% animated!
•New 562 hit marks

•New Whip+Dharok axe model

•New teleport interfaces!(Look down at the pictures)

•New Pk System

•PK Points System
•Shops

•Fletching

•Mage Bank

[center]The Most Coolest Thing In The Game That I Have Been Working On, Are The Events!
I Have Xmas Event and An Easter Event! (and you will recieve a prize once finished) [/center]
